thread.title: eTN to support China Xi’an Silk Road International Tourism Expo as media partner
thread.title_full: eTN to support China Xi’an Silk Road International Tourism Expo as media partner

author: eTN Editor
title: eTN to support China Xi’an Silk Road International Tourism Expo as media partner
text:
eTN to support China Xi’an Silk Road International Tourism Expo as media partner   
Aug 21, 2015 eTN   
eTurboNews (eTN) announced it will support the China Xi’an Silk Road International Tourism Expo (CXSRITE) as a media partner. The event is scheduled to be held from September 11-13, 2015 at the Xi’an Qujiang International Conference & Exhibition Centre on Huixin Road in Yanta, Xi'an, Shaanxi, China. 
Said eTN publisher Juergen T. Steinmetz: “Those who attend this event will have the chance to meet quality buyers and trade visitors and explore lucrative business opportunities in Northwestern China’s tourism markets. It is an exceptional opportunity to network in this highly-profitable travel destination. eTurboNews has a global subscriber base of 230,000 and the potential reach of 1.3 million, including 17,000 journalists. Our publications are produced as soon as the news comes out, and is the perfect media distribution network for CXSRITE.” 
China Xi’an Silk Road International Tourism Expo is China’s first international tourism event with a unique theme. Strongly supported by governmental authorities and with the goal of providing an all-rounded exhibition service, CXSRITE will provide the ideal one-stop business-to-business networking platform for international and domestic tourism and travel industry players. 
China’s President, Mr. Xi Jingping, a native of Shaanxi, proposed building a new “Silk Road Economic Belt” during an official visit to Kazakhstan a couple of years back. The main objectives of the new initiative is to connect China with countries along the ancient Silk Road and other regions in order to create new activities and programs for greater economic development and social prosperity for all. 
In line with President Xi's proposal, the Shaanxi Tourism Administration organized the China Xi'an Silk Road International Tourism Expo. CXSRITE aims to further explore and promote tourism and travels between China and the rest of the world.
